resources:
AntiBandit Motion sensor is used to detect the motion of your phone. When you started that feature the cell phone automatically locked after 5 seconds and after locking if you moves the mobile the siren started and the device finger sensor disabled and the administrator lock is enabled. When you unlock the device the siren stopped. This feature works only for that users who has a pin lock security. To use this feature you have to enabled the device administrator properties for this application This feature is basically used to check out the battery status. This works with the SMS service. The special code is set to use this feature at the time of enabling a feature. when a user sends a simple text message from any number with this pre set code that feature return the battery status to that number. No extra prerequisites are required to use this feature. When charging your smart phone, charger mode detects if someone disconnects it and then triggers a loud siren that will help to you to get alerted instantly and prevent theft. If a person again attached the charger the siren will stopped again and if it not attached the charger back then siren remain started till the charger is not connect. To use this feature you have to connect the charger first. To disable this feature you have to connect charger first if it is enabled This feature is most important feature for the safety of mobile phones. This feature basically deals with the GPS Location. At the time of enabling this feature user sets a code. When user sends that code from any mobile this feature returns a GPS location to that number. To use this feature you have to enable the location. When you are listening songs and other media through headphone or hands free this feature is enabled if anyone disconnects the headphone the siren is started and ring till the headphone is connected back. This feature is not disabled till the headphone connected back. You can only use this feature while using the headphone This feature needs no prerequisites. Pocket sensor is used to detect the pocket sensing motion of your phone. When you started that feature the cell phone automatically locked after 5 seconds and after locking if you moves the mobile from the pocket the siren started and the device finger sensor disabled and the administrator locked is enabled. When you unlock the device the siren stopped. This feature works only for that users who has a pin lock security. To use this feature you have to enabled the device administrator properties for this application This feature is used with the SMS service. At the time of enabling the feature user sets a code. when you sends that code from any device with simple text msg the device locked automatically and siren started. When you unlocked the screen the siren stopped. This feature required to make device administrator this application. Torch mode is used to make a torch light enable and disable with the help of text message from any device. To ON the torch from text your code is \'FLASHON\' and to OFF the torch the code is \'FLASHOFF\'. This feature required no prerequisites. battery Set a Keyword for Battery Save Set a Keyword for Ring Alarm ring No requests

admin Enable the admin rights ADMIN Autonomous Mode battery Sends the battery level BATTERY DISABLE ON/OFF Disables power button when smartphone is locked DISABLE STATUS BAR Triggers a loud alarm when charger is disconnected and takes selfies CHARGER DISCONNECTION CHARGER Cable unplugged Secret Code commands Sends the list of available commands COMMANDS contact Returns the contact list CONTACTS continue DETECTIVE detective OFF ON Enable "%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services." Enable Google Play services Install "%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device." Get Google Play services Google Play services error %1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again. "%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device." Update "%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services." Update Google Play services "%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating." New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly. gps Returns the GPS location GPS hideicon Hides the app icon HIDE ICON Sends a selfie after 2 malicious unlock attempts ACCESS CONTROL light Turns on the lamp torch LIGHT lock Locks the smartphone remotely LOCK logcall Sends the call log LOG CALL Sends a low battery alert with GPS location LOW BATTERY Triggers a loud alarm when your smartphone moves and takes selfies MOTION DETECTION MOTION Motion detected NEW SIM CARD 27 Open on phone popup Displays a message on the screen and takes selfies POPUP \? report Sends selfie + contacts + call log + GPS + battery level REPORT ring Makes the phone ring at max volume even on silent mode RING selfie Takes a photo using front camera SELFIE SENSIBILITY showicon Unhides the app icon Sign in Sign in with Google Detects new SIM card inserted and sends the details with a selfie and GPS location SIM CHANGE siren Triggers an alarm and takes selfies SIREN SMS Mode Disables status bar when smartphone is locked Unavailable video Captures a video using front camera VIDEO VOLUME wipedata Initiates a factory reset RESET Configuration ADMIN BATTERY COMMANDS CONTACT DETECTIVE DISABLE ALL ENABLE ALL GPS HIDEICON LIGHT LOCK LOGCALL POPUP REPORT RING SELFIE SIREN WIPEDATA OFF ON (7) Admin rights disabled ! Please note that some features will not work unless Admin Rights are enabled. Cancel Charger mode is now disabled Charger mode is now enabled ! Anti-Theft Security - Charger Mode CHARGER my code ? SMS command : The phone will send the battery level when it receives an SMS with following command: The phone will send the list of commands when it receives an SMS with following command: The phone will send the contact list when it receives an SMS with following command: The phone will return GPS location when it receives an SMS with following command: The app icon will disappear when it receives an SMS with following command: The phone will turn the flash on when it receives an SMS with following command: The phone will be locked when it receives an SMS with following command: The phone will send the call log when it receives an SMS with following command: The phone will display a popup when it receives an SMS with following command: The phone will send the report when it receives an SMS with following command: The phone will ring when it receives an SMS with following command: The phone will take a selfie when it receives an SMS with following command: The phone will start the siren when it receives an SMS with following command: "The phone will start the video capture when it receives an SMS with following command : " The phone will start the factory reset when it receives an SMS with following command: To test this feature please enter your phone number. You will receive an SMS* and an Email containing all the commands available. "Your contact list will be sent to following adress: " Description : This feature enables the admin rights for this app. Sends the battery level by email and SMS. "When charging your smartphone, charger mode detects if someone disconnects it and then triggers a loud siren that will help you to get alerted instantly and prevent theft. A selfie is captured if a wrong secret code is entered, if any key press is detected and finally 3 sec after the alarm starts.
To disable charger mode temporarily, simply tap on the notification.
Do not forget to lock your screen when charging your smartphone for optimal safety." Sends the list of all commands available via email and SMS. Sends your contact list via email. "Detective mode handles the following :
1. SIM CHANGE Sends a selfie and all information related to new SIM card inserted via email.
2. LOW BATTERY Sends an email alert along with GPS location in case of low battery.
3. ACCESS CONTROL Sends an email alert with a selfie attached when 2 wrong passwords are entered.
4. DISABLE ON/OFF Disables power button whenever your smartphone is locked." " 5. DISABLE STATUS BAR Prevents the status bar from expanding when the device is locked." Sends the GPS location of your smartphone by SMS and email using Google Maps. "Hides the app icon in order to prevent the thief from uninstalling it. There are 2 ways of launching the app then :
1. Call #007 2. Call #" Turns the light of your smartphone on. This feature locks your smartphone. Sends the call log via email. "Motion mode detects if someone touches your smartphone and then triggers a loud siren that will help you to get alerted instantly. A selfie is captured if a wrong secret code is entered, if any key press is detected and finally 3 sec after the alarm starts.
To disable motion mode, tap on the notification.
Do not forget to lock your screen for optimal safety. " "Displays a popup message on your screen so the person who found it can contact you via email and SMS. You can also customize the message. Default: \"[code]:popup\" Customized: \"[code]:popup:yourMessage\"
A selfie will also be taken upon key press." Sends by email the following : selfie, contact list, call log and battery level. GPS location will also be sent via SMS. "Makes your smartphone ring during 2 minutes even if it's on silent or vibrate mode. The flash light will be turned on in the meantime." Sends a picture using the front camera of your smartphone by email. Triggers a loud siren protected by your secret code. A selfie is captured if a wrong secret code is entered, if any key press is detected and 3 sec after the alarm starts. Captures a video using front camera and sends it by email. Wipes your personal data. Be cautious, the smartphone will start the factory reset a few seconds after receiving the SMS command. Detective mode is now enabled. It requires admin rights and GPS location in order to send the position in case of low battery. Detective mode is disabled ! Anti-Theft Security needs admin rights to monitor any incorrect unlock attempts, lock the screen remotely and erase all data if requested by the user. DISABLE Dismiss "Don't ask again" Email : ENABLE GPS disabled ! You should give admin rights to the app to use this feature. You should enable GPS location to use this feature. HIDE App icon will reappear. The process takes some time or requires a reboot depending on the smartphone. The process takes some time or requires a reboot depending on the smartphone. You can launch the app by calling the following number : #007 You can show the app icon again from this menu or by sending the following SMS command : INFO Work in progress... "The log call will be sent to following adress: " Update Alarm activation Motion alarm enabled You need to get Pro version No Internet connection You need to enable the feature to perform a test Tap to disable Number : OK or phone number Please check the following data : Please enter your phone number first "Some features will not work. Please tap to enable admin rights." To test this feature please enter your phone number to receive a message via SMS* and email from the person who found your phone. Prerequisite : This feature requires admin rights to be enabled. This feature requires GPS location and admin rights to be enabled. This feature requires your email address. This feature requires GPS location to be enabled. This feature requires your email address and GPS location to be enabled. This feature does not require any prerequisite. Would you like to receive your secret code by email ? To test this feature please enter your phone number. You will receive an SMS* containing the battery level of your smartphone. To test this feature please enter your phone number. You will receive an SMS* containing a google maps link. Please open the link to check GPS location of your smartphone. The rest of the report will be sent via Email. code "A selfie will be sent to following adress: " UNHIDE *Standard SMS cost To test this feature please enter your phone number. You will receive an SMS* containing a google maps link. Please open the link to check GPS location of your smartphone. TEST "A video will be sent to following adress: " You will receive an email in few seconds... You will receive an SMS in few seconds... This feature is not available for testing to avoid any inconvenience. The factory reset will start a few seconds after receiving the SMS command. Be cautious, the operation is irreversible. The app answers by SMS or by email List of commands Charge your smartphone safely with charger mode 4. Disables volume keys 3. Secures with secret code 2. Takes selfies 1. Triggers a loud siren The detective mode monitors your smartphone at any time Keep an eye on your smartphone with motion mode Send an SMS command to your lost smartphone How to use the app ? SIM change detection Support: mosi.antitheft.contact@gmail.com "By using this app, you accept the "Terms and Conditions. Welcome to Welcome "Welcome to Anti-Theft Security !
This app allows you to find your lost or stolen smartphone.
Support: mosi.antitheft.contact@gmail.com" "Your secret code is: " Welcome ! Anti-Theft Security uses your own Gmail account to send emails. This ensures that your personal data such as photos, locations etc. do not end up on third party servers. "This secret code allows you to customize and secure the commands sent to your smartphone. Don't share it with anyone." BUY Delete this banner, buy Pro version and unlock all features Google prevents apps from hiding the status bar starting Android 8.0 Oreo. If you still want DISABLE STATUS BAR feature, you need to install Antitheft Security as system app. FREE "Unlock Pro version features One time fee - Lifetime license" "Know more" PRO Thank you for upgrading to Pro ! Pro Version Device Admin: disabled Device Admin: enabled Search Admin Admin rights are mandatory for the use of certain features (lock, wipedata, detective...) Code This code allows you to secure the commands sent via SMS COMPARE DISABLE Email This email address will be used to send data from your smartphone if it is lost or stolen ENABLE GPS Enable GPS to get the location of your smartphone OK Please enable the admin rights Settings SIM Save your new sim card in order to be alerted in case of sim change SIM saved ! Uninstall By clicking OK, the admin rights will be disabled in order to allow the application to be uninstalled Upgrade Buy Pro version and unlock all features 999+
GPS disabled Settings Exit To use this application you must enable GPS in system settings
Set a Keyword for Getting location location
Check protected list. To use this application you must check that it can operate in sleep mode.
Enable accessibility service. To work properly on devices from some manufacturer like Huawei, Mi and etc. Application must be registered as accessibility service. If you have device from on of such brand, or app didn\'t work after reboot, you mast enable Anti Bandit accessibility service. To services Skip Request already processed but will be updated Last known location is undefined. Fine location will be send to you later. Last known location is:
Initiated positioning By request from phone:
Initiated Alarm By request from phone:
On some devices form Huawei, OnePlus, Mi and etc OS prevent apps from starting up their services automatically on boot complete. To avoid it bug we need registered and enable accessibility service. \n Full explanation of this trick can be found here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41524459/broadcast-receiver-not-working-after-device-reboot-in-android/41627296
